body:
Hi Everyone

I am having an issue compiling OpenMPI 3 + Cuda [as described on their Github](https://github.com/open-mpi/ompi/issues/5510).

OpenMPI developers have not yet answered the question yet so I wanted to see if anyone here has ran into the same issue.  NVidia drivers are present while I am not able to find anything else missing.
title: Cannot Compile OpenMPI3 with Cuda Support
